FAQAnswers.title: Are there shops for daily necessities available?
FAQAnswers.content: Yes, there are supermarkets within a 5-minute walking distance, and there are also many shops in the city center, which is a 10-minute walk away.

FAQAnswers.title: How about nearby medical services and pharmacies?
FAQAnswers.content: We have a small hospital in Cupramontana that also offers medical services during nights and weekends. There are two pharmacies in the city center, which are just a 10-minute walk away.

FAQAnswers.title: We are traveling with babies. Do you provide child seats and baby cots?
FAQAnswers.content: Yes, we have three child seats and one baby cot available.

FAQAnswers.title: Do we need to bring our own towels and linens?
FAQAnswers.content: No, we provide sufficient towels and bed linens.

FAQAnswers.title: Do you have a washing machine available?
FAQAnswers.content: Yes, we have a washing machine.

FAQAnswers.title: How far is it to the nearest beach or sea?
FAQAnswers.content: Within a 35-minute drive, you can reach Senigallia, known for its beautiful sandy beaches (shallow waters ideal for kids), or Sirolo/Numana, famous for their stunning rocky beaches.

FAQAnswers.title: What type of disinfection do you use for your pool?
FAQAnswers.content: We use a salt system for disinfection.
